thread.title: Lance Bass reveals he was "inappropriately" touched while in 'N Sync
thread.title_full: Lance Bass reveals he was "inappropriately" touched while in 'N Sync

title: Lance Bass reveals he was "inappropriately" touched while in 'N Sync
text:
Lance Bass reveals he was "inappropriately" touched while in 'N Sync Lance Bass has revealed that as a teen in 'N Sync he was sexually harassed by someone who worked with the band. More >> Lance Bass has revealed that as a teen in 'N Sync he was sexually harassed by someone who worked with the band. More >> Selena Gomez is done letting the media tell her story. More >> Selena Gomez is done letting the media tell her story. More >> Daniel Craig would rather kill himself than play James Bond again Only a few weeks before Spectre hits theaters, Daniel Craig said he would prefer suicide to doing a fifth James Bond movie. More >> Only a few weeks before Spectre hits theaters, Daniel Craig said he would prefer suicide to doing a fifth James Bond movie. More >> Nicki Minaj calls out Miley Cyrus' hypocrisy and puts the New York Times in their place Six weeks after asking "Miley, what's good?" on the Video Music Awards stage, Nicki Minaj expounded on the deep-seated hypocrisy she sees in Miley Cyrus talking to The New York Times. More >> Six weeks after asking "Miley, what's good?" on the Video Music Awards stage, Nicki Minaj expounded on the deep-seated hypocrisy she sees in Miley Cyrus talking to The New York Times. More >> 
By Shelli Weinstein, 
Lance Bass has revealed that as a teen in 'N Sync he was sexually harassed by someone who worked with the band. 
The singer shared his story briefly on The Meredith Vieira Show on Wednesday, as the hosts were discussing Ashley Judd's own revelation that she was once sexually harassed by a studio executive trying to bribe her with movie roles. 
"It happens to men too," he said, sharing that when he was a teen "there was someone that we worked with that was inappropriately touching us." 
He said that at the time he knew "that this guy was a pedophile and he was touching me oddly," though he didn't feel victimized by the alleged, unnamed offender because he was "aware of it." 
Ashley Judd says she was sexually harassed by a studio executive 
Despite the illegal and very personal violation, the star never went to authorities or talked about it much outside of mentioning it to his bandmates. "With the guys, we would talk about it," he said. "We would kind of joke about it, but it's not a joking thing. But as a kid, it was just odd." 
Watch the clip from his interview here .
